pkgmetadata.longdescription: The rock-dkms a package containing both the ROCK-Kernel-Driver and the latest firmware (which is not installed in this package). This package will build the kernel modules using the DKMS framework allowing for version agnostic compatibility meaning that you can compile this package against 4.20.x, 5.0.x, 5.1.x, 5.2.x kernel versions. The ROCk package has more GPU features like IPC related features (Memory sharing API, Signal sharing API); increasing GPU system memory limits from 3/8 of system memory to 29/32 of system memory; RDMA (aka Remote Device Programming or ROCmRDMA) to allow other PCIe kernel modules and devices DMA access to GPU memory, KFD (Kernel Fusion Driver) features, and DirectGMA (Direct Graphic Memory Access) support. ROCk is also a core componenet of the ROCm platform.
